title: SCCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for General Manager Posts
text: SCCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for General Manager Posts SCCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for General Manager Posts: Singareni Collieries Company Limited (SCCL) has invited applications for the recruitment of General Manager (Operations & Maintenance) vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online from 01-01-2017 to 10-01-2017 up to 05:00 pm. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… SCCL Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: General Manager (Operations & Maintenance) Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 52 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess BE/ B.Tech Mechanical Engineering or Electrical Engineering with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on personal interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website “scclmines.com” from 01-01-2017 to 10-01-2017 up to 05:00 pm & send hard copy of filled application forms to General Manager (Personnel)/ RC, IR&PM. C/O Chief Co-ordinator, Power Projects Division, III Floor, The SCCL, Redhills, Hyderabad- 500004, Telangana state by post/ courier in an envelope super scripted as “Registration No. ____ Name of the Post ___” on or before 12-01-2017 at 05:00 pm. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Login through the website “scclmines.com”. 2. Click on “Careers —> Notification”. 3. Select desired post & click on “Apply Online”. 4. Fill all the details carefully & submit the form. 5. Take printout of application form for future use. Important Dates: Start Date to Apply Online: 01-01-2017. Last Date to Apply Online: 10-01-2017 up to 05:00 pm. Last Date for Submission of Hard Copy of Applications: 12-01-2017 at 05:00 pm.
